cache_name.description: Name of the redis cache instance

cache_tier.description: The service tier of the instance. Possible values are BASIC, STANDARD_HA.

network_id.description: The full name of the Google Compute Engine network to which the instance is connected.

transit_encryption_mode.description: The TLS mode of the Redis instance, If not provided, TLS is disabled for the instance.

maintenance_schedule.description: Weekly maintenance window that is applied to resources covered by this policy.
